forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain by the afternoon hours. High 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers this morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low -3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 28F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening will become rain and snow showers in the overnight hours. Low -2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the overnight hours. Low around 30F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 28F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 6C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High near 45F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 39F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 6C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 44F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 2C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 37F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 44F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 6C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 47F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 46F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low around 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 34F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 46F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low around 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low 34F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 30%.
